body.name: Nuwave OxyPure ZERO Smart Air Purifier, Large Area up to 2,002 Sq Ft, Dual 4-Stage Air Filtration, Adjustable 30°, 60°, 90° Vents, Washable & Reusable Filters for ZERO Waste & Replacements, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: INDOOR AIR POLLUTION - EPA estimates that the air indoors can be as much as 5 TIMES more polluted than outdoors. If you suffer from fatigue, headaches, congestion, coughing, and sneezing, you may be exposed to poor air quality conditions in the home.

PURIFY XL AREA UP TO 2,002 SQ FT - Unseen to the naked eye, you may unwittingly be inhaling billions of unseen pollutants and allergens into your lungs with every breath you take. OxyPure is proven to effectively purify a 1000 sq. ft room 2 x per hour and a 2002 sq. ft room 1 x per hour.

INTERTEK LAB CERTIFIED – Zero captures 100% of airborne particle pollutants as small as 0.1 microns including smoke, dust, and pollen. It removes airborne viruses, pollen, mold spores, dust, bacteria, pet dander, harmful chemicals, allergens, and Ozone.

DUAL 4-STAGE FILTERATION – Stainless-steel prefilter captures large particles & allergens. Ozone emission removal filter eliminates toxic Ozone. 2 Hi-Tech Bio-Guard Filters & 1 Bio-Guard 360 Filter remove harmful airborne particle pollutants and odors.

REVOLUTIONARY FILTER TECHNOLOGY – Just like the vacuum cleaners did away with paper filters, OxyPure Zero does away with paper filters. The ultra-effective Bio-Guard filters are washable and reusable meaning ZERO waste and ZERO filter replacements.

CALIFORNIA AIR RESOURCE BOARD CERTIFIED – OxyPure Zero meets the stringent California ozone emissions limit. It eliminates toxic Ozone in the home to less than 1 part per billion (ppb) about 70 times less than the EPA’s designated safe level of 70 ppb.

ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED – Even when operating 24/7, the annual electricity cost is less than $10! Check with your local utility company to determine if a portion of the purchase qualifies for a rebate. It is also FCC and ETL certified.

SMART DEVICE & WIFI CAPABLE – OxyPure Zero is WIFI capable. You can connect remotely to monitor and control the air quality in your home anytime, anywhere from an app on your phone. The app is compatible with both Android and i-Phones.
NIGHT-TIME SLEEP MODE - OxyPure Zero is designed with Night-Time mode. All indicator lights turn off and fan operates at whisper-quiet level at 21.41 dB to help promote ideal sleeping conditions.

WHAT’S INCLUDED – 2 stainless-steel pre-filters, 2 ozone emission removal filters, 2 Bio-Guard filters, 1 Bio-Guard 360 Filter & 1 owner’s manual. With the exception of ozone removal filters, all filters are washable. Expected life span is 20 years.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Air Matters Everywhere 2 Office 3 Living Spaces 4 Bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is phenomenal
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for a way to keep odors and dust down in my house. This fits the ticket. Only runs when it detects dust and ran after I made oyster stew so the house didn’t smell like fish. Follow directions on how to set it up, set it how it told me, and never touched it again. Love the fact that I can wash filters or brush vacuum 2 of them so I’m not storing tons of filters. Love it so much, I ordered another one for our other end of the house in our bedroom to keep dust at bay. And who wants a dusty bedroom. 5 stars with no issues. Easy set up. It does run loud when the dog gets the zoomies and stirs things up. Recommend this product as it’s all but eliminated the dust on my glass top stove. No more wiping dust before I cook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is super easy to navigate, and I can tell a huge difference in the air quality after using it. It's pricey, but I was tired of spending so much for filters. I'm glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well!
reviews.reviewText: I have seared steaks where the house was smoky and within an hour all smell and smoke was gone! The odor sensor is so sensitive,when I added a few drops of essential oil to a diffuser across the room, it activated the air purifier and nullified the aroma.I haven't tried to clean the filters yet (only had it for a month so far) but I bought this model primarily for the washable filters so I hope it goes as promised.The house truly smells like nothing when you enter. With two dogs, that is impressive.It is a bit loud on its highest setting so we have to turn the TV up a bit in that case but I still love it and would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality product
reviews.reviewText: Great product I have had this unit for 6 months and does a great job. I really like the fact that the filters are reusable after a simple cleaning. No wasted money on buying filters. Only thing I don’t like is if it losses power, or you have an internet failure or you unplug it to move it, you lose WiFi connection etc you must manually reconnect the unit to your WiFi. Having to manually reconnect to the WiFi is why I have it 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Will Impress You!
reviews.reviewText: I believe there are two newer models above this one, but for the price, this model is Awesome! My two favorite things about it is when the purifier is set in AUTO mode, it goes active to clean the air as soon as it detects odors. Examples = Food, Cigarette Smoke or the lighting of a Fireplace. I have also noticed a significant decrease in the amount of dust in the house, and the fact that ALL of the filters are washable, is a huge plus. I should have bought this thing years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With cats or dogs this is a great air purifier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOESN'T LAST A YEAR!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in September of 2023. It worked great! The room I put it in has my bird which cockatoos put off a white powder like dust. It did an excellent job. I ran it continuously and the air quality was great.In January 2024, all of a sudden the motor seized. For nearly $400 and it doesn't last a year? Piece of junk! I bought it because it said you didn't have to buy new filters. Well - save your money and buy one that is half the price and deal with buying new filters every few months. You'll be glad you did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect air cleaner
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It cleaned the air in my condo when my neighbors cooking smells make its way into my house. I also notice I breath better at night when sleeping.
